notes.text:
Memed my first 40 wins or so with decks like King of the Skull Servants and Ninjas, played Bujins exclusively by Legend 2. This is an extremely inflated KoG since on my streak 2 opponents DC’d and my rank up match was literally against a 27 card SSA deck
rn the best Bujin build imo is 30 cards with Grass and Ties, I own 0 Ties though so my build is firmly different. Lowered the deck to just 27 to draw Grass or Yamato more often, I don’t think the full 30 is necessary w/o Ties, tho a 28th card in a 3rd Sinyou or 1 Arasuda would work fine.
